personal_info.professional_summary: Computer Science student at Stevens Institute of Technology with expertise in machine learning, NLP, and full-stack development. Research experience in multilingual LLM systems and proven track record in student leadership managing $2.2M in organizational funding.

experience.title: Research Assistant
experience.company: Natural Language Processing Lab at Stevens
experience.description: Engineering multilingual LLM systems trained on international news datasets that preserve cultural context in translations and integrate with news aggregation platforms.
achievements: Engineering multilingual LLM systems trained on international news datasets
Preserving cultural context in translations using DeepSeek R1 Model
Integrating with NextJS/NodeJS/MongoDB news aggregation platform

experience.title: Assistant Vice President of Finance
experience.description: Managing strategic collaboration with campus club leaders and facilitating organizational funding allocation.
achievements: Managed strategic collaboration with 150+ campus club leaders
Facilitated allocation of $2.2 million in organizational funding
Supported diverse student events and activities across campus

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Machine Learning Concentration

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: Responsive portfolio featuring on-device Llama 3.3 AI integration via WebLLM, built with React/Next.js and optimized for 95%+ Lighthouse performance score

projects.name: Student Productivity Agent
projects.description: Modular agent-based system called FlowState using LangGraph that orchestrates specialized AI agents for course material analysis, project management, and study scheduling

projects.name: Assignment Tracker
projects.description: Modern assignment tool that monitors Canvas for new assignments and updates a Notion database in real-time
